remixlab.proscene

Class KeyAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.core.Agent

  • public class KeyAgent
extends Agent
    Proscene key-agent. A Processing fully fledged key Agent.
    See Also:
    Agent, MouseAgent, remixlab.proscene.DroidKeyAgent, remixlab.proscene.DroidTouchAgent
